Text.Value: I need to reach the Crown and cast the spell to compel it to submit. We must dominate the brain!

Text.Value: Go quickly now - get to the Crown and cast the spell! We will keep the enemy at bay.

Text.Value: Dominate the brain - now! Or all is lost!

Text.Value: Press on - get to the Crown, cast the spell. Do not let these enemies distract you.

Text.Value: The enemies just keep coming... Hurry!

Text.Value: The enemies are still coming - make haste!

Text.Value: These forces are just a distraction - I must reach the Crown, cast the spell, and dominate the brain!

Text.Value: Get to the brain, damn you! Dominate it or we're all going to die!
Dominate the brain - do it now!
Get to the brain - act now or we're all doomed!
We're almost out of time. The brain - hurry!
By the living gods, get that damned brain under control!
Dominate the brain! Now, soldier, now!
The brain - there is no more time!
Dominate the brain - do it now or all is lost!
We cannot survive this much longer. Dominate the brain, now!
We swat at flies while the great turd lingers still - THE BRAIN!
Do it - dominate the brain. NOW!

EditorData.NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

Text.Value: I'm wasting time killing trash - I need to dominate the brain!
These minions are a distraction. I need to dominate the brain!
The lesser foes are a distraction - dominating the brain is what matters.
The lesser foes are a distraction - dominating the brain is what matters.
Forget these minions - I need to take control of the brain!
These goons will keep me busy 'til the end of the world. I need to get to the brain!
These forces are just a distraction - I have to dominate the brain!

EditorData.NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

Text.Value: You need to go - get to the Crown and cast the spell to dominate the brain! I can hold them here.
I'll fend them off. You need to take control of the Netherbrain! Get to the Crown and cast the spell - now!
Get to the Crown and cast the spell - I'll buy you what time I can!
Go, get to the Crown and cast the spell. Dominate the Netherbrain. Let me take care of this!
I'll handle these ignots. You go dominate the brain! Get to the Crown, and cast the spell!
Focus on the brain! Get to the Crown, and cast the spell. The rest, you leave to us.
Hurry, get to the brain and cast the spell to compel it to submit! I shall buy you time!
Even I cannot fight forever. Get to the brain, and cast the spell. You must dominate the brain.
Do not forget it is the brain's butt we must kick, my friend! Get to the Crown and cast the spell!
Hurry, get to the brain and cast the spell to compel it to submit. I'll cover you!
Get to the Crown, and cast the spell. We'll see off the enemies!

For Karlach: 'IG-not' her own word for idiots

Text.Value: We must dominate the brain. NOW.

Text.Value: Will you please go and dominate the brain? We can't hold forever.
I cannot hold forever. Get the brain under control!
Time is running short - seize control of the brain, now!
There's too many to fight off - get that brain under control or we're done for!
Hurry up. They won't stop 'til the brain is under control!
This isn't going to stop until that brain is under control.
More minions - strike at the brain!
There is no end to these foes - we have to dominate the brain!
This onslaught will never cease until we have control of the brain. Dominate it, now!
The brain, my friend! Boo and I will hold off the horde!
They just keep coming. Hurry!

EditorData.NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it

Synopsis:
Some time has passed fighting the netherbrain, and the players still haven't started to dominate the brain. This AD serves to refocus the players, with increasing degrees of intensity.

Will typically be played on COMPANIONS.Those companions can include emperor and orpheus. If none are available, there is a special version for the FULL_CEREMORPH  mindflayer to urge themselves onwards.
